"I read you." LORD ELDER's voice crackled across the comlink. The
radiation is making the channel spark and fzzz, but it is still not
enough to make ELDER's voice unclear. "What kind of power source is
this and how is this affecting the Protohumans in the area?"

He was of course unaware that these were closer to humans creatures
than anything that the MAXIMALS or PREDACONS had seen before. -
Something was definitle strange here.

Meanwhile anyone looking in the door way can see that this particular
tunnel was once a smaller tunnel but has been widened out, presumably
by the humanaiods themselves. The walls are bacially bare rock.

The sound of some sort of stone on stone hammering can be heard echoig
from deep within.

(TAG)

OOC: Airly, please keep in mind that Perceptor is detecting the
radiation from something that could be Uranium. The radiation is
something that could be used for an energy source, but there is
nothing refined or being used actively as an energy source. At least
not anywhere in sensor range.

- Preston
